name: Artificially Dry Perennial Length (%)
functionStatement: Historically perennial channels remain wetted during expected seasons; artificial dewatering does not fragment habitat.
descriptionMarkdown: Percent of historically perennial network length that is dry/disconnected during expected flowing season (lower is better).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Define historically perennial extent; map dry segments during target season(s); compute % length dry.
